column5: Hey All,  My first report.  Only fit that it come from my 7 year old son.  He has actually gotten me back into fishing.  LOVES fishing...couldn't wait to get out this afternoon.  Here are some pics...enjoy!
the smile on your sons face is great and pretty much sums up fishing
that's a Great first repot!  Ya never have to apologize for posting pics   Your sons smile says it all  Thanks for sharing  Maureen
He's got the look of an addicted fisherman.  Ain't no stoppin' him now.   Thanks for sharing.

He's got the hold and pose down perfectly!  My kids got us back into the sport as well, and now my wife and I fish religiously !!!  Great report and pics...seeing the smile on a kid holding a fish is priceless.
Very happy little fisherman indeed.  Kids grow up really quickly.  Thanks for sharing.
awsome pics nothing better than enjoying fishing with your kids
Great first report.  Always love seeing the kids excited about fishing
Wow, and he has the bass 'hold' down and everything!  A budding Bassmaster!!!

Is that a crappie he's holding in the first picture?!? I've been fishing for 23 years and I've never even seen one! hahaha  that's so sweet - thanks for the report.  I can't wait until my daughter is old enough to come out  cheers uf
Thanks for sharing, certainly a great way to spend time with the kids..
Very nice to see the kids taking part!!! It beats sitting around and playing XBOX all day!! Well done! Nice pics!
Great pics sunfish  Looks like you've got a great fishing buddy for life...Quite possibly one who'll out-fish you each and every trip.

Yeah,  that was his very first crappie.  He was supper excited.  Haven't caught much crappie myself either.  I was actually packing up getting ready to leave and he screams out "dad...I caught a crappie".
yeah he seems to have mastered the 'hold' ... i bet he outfishes you every trip!  thanks for posting
